Dark.NAME: Dark
Dark.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Lose !M! HP when Discarded.

DropOfBlood.NAME: Drop of Blood
DropOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.

Flatten.NAME: Flatten
Flatten.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! X gold of Damage given.

Happy.NAME: Happy
Happy.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Add a Sad to the discard pile. NL Exhaust.
Happy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Add a Sad+ to the discard pile. NL Exhaust.

Light.NAME: Light
Light.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Heal !M! HP when Discarded.

Lost.NAME: Lost
Lost.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to 3 Cards. NL Heal !M! HP for every Card Discarded.

Sad.NAME: Sad
Sad.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Add a Happy to the discard pile. NL Exhaust.
Sad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Add a Happy+ to the discard pile. NL Exhaust.
